projectDesc.p: The Göttingen Register of Electronic Texts in Indian Languages (GRETIL) is a resource platform providing standardized machine-readable texts in Indian languages that have been contributed by various individuals and institutions.

correction.p: Apparent errors have been silently corrected.

normalization.p: GRETIL normalizes all texts contributed consistently for each language. Sanskrit texts are normalized in accordance with the scheme of the International Alphabet of Sanskrit Transliteration (IAST) in order to facilitate word search across its corpus without additional transformations.

All characters that were fully equivalent to an IAST-conformant character in the text file contributed have been made to conform to the character list below. Non-conformant characters with additional information including accents, capitalization, and whitespace have been preserved as orig elements inside choice elements with their IAST-conformant equivalent in reg elements for the creation of a plain text. These additional informations will be available only in those transformations of this file that display the original information.

quotation.p: If indicated unambiguously in the text file contributed quotation marks have been replaced with the q element and, in case a reference was provided, have been nested inside a cit with the respective reference provided in a ref element after the quote.

segmentation.p: Unnumbered div elements are used to structure the text, using the type and n attributes in accordance with the refsDecl.

Remarks in note elements with the @resp attribute identifying the agency.

lg.l: yasminn udayati vikasati kamalam ivāstaṃ prayāti saṃkucati/
sacarācaraṃ tribhuvanaṃ sa jayati kiraṇālayaḥ savitā//
yakṣeśamedhena vijitya dhātrīm ity evam abhyudyamino nṛpasya/
vinighnato vighnakarān na pāpaṃ kriyāt krameṇaiva paśūn makheṣu//
prajānurakto dhṛtimān sahiṣṇur vṛddhopasevī vijigīṣur iṣṭaḥ//
sāmvatsaras tasya vinītaveṣo dhīmān svatantrāṅgapaṭuḥ kulīnaḥ/
dakṣaḥ pragalbho 'vikalo vinītas tādṛg vidhastasya purohito 'pi//
tatra kecid avadhūya nṛkāraṃ daivam eva phaladāyakam āhuḥ//
labdhavyāny eva labhyate gantavyāny eva gacchati/
prāptavyāny eva prāproti duḥkhāni ca sukhāni ca//
utthānāc ced bhavet siddhir na kaścit prāpnuyāt phalam/
tasmād daivaṃ pradhānaṃ hi na kuryāt karma mānuṣam/
niśceṣṭam api loke 'smin bhajate bhuktir uttamā//
āghātadurjayanayaṃ paribhūya daivam ātmābhimānacapalāḥ pracaranti ye 'rīn/
teṣāṃ cirād api kṛtāntamahāpaśūnāṃ hastagrahaṃ na samupaiti jitāpi lakṣmī//
utthānahīno rājā hi buddhimān api sarvadā/
na vinā mānuṣaṃ daivaṃ daivaṃ vā mānuṣaṃ vinā/
daivāt purusakārāc ca na tv ekasmāt kathājcana//
yatnena sampadya manuṣyakāraṃ yatnāvakāśe puruṣo niruddhaḥ/
pratīkṣate daivamataṃ dvitīyas tam āpado nātmakṛtāḥ spṛśanti//
kṛcchreṇa śeṣaṃ mahatā yato 'to bhājyāni mṛgyāṇi nṛbhir nṛkāraiḥ//E20
yātrākālam ataḥ paraṃ munimatāny ālokya saṃkhyāpayā-
jñāte janmani tasya yānasamayaṃ vāṃchanti horāvidas
tv ajñāte 'py aphaleṣu nākṣaram iva prāhātra ratnāvalim//
āyuṣi ca parijñāte śubham aśubhaṃ vā phalaṃ vācyam//
apṛcchataḥ pṛcchato vā yiyāsor yasya kasya cit/
aśrauṣīc ca purā viṣṇor jñānārthaṃ samupasthitaḥ/
yat sāraṃ pṛcchataḥ puṃso graharā(śyā)śritaṃ phalam/
tatsāraṃ tasya janma syād ya(dya)py anyagṛhe bhavet//
sad iti sadasi vācyaṃ yady api syād asat tat
sphuṭam pai kathanīyaṃ bhūbhuje mantriṇe vā//
udayam udayapaṃ vā janmabhaṃ janmapaṃ vā
tad upacayagṛhaṃ vā vīkṣya lagne yiyāsoḥ/
vinihatam aripakṣaṃ viddhi śatror idaṃ vā
pārṣṇigrāhaḥ pṛṣṭhato bhāskarasya prāg yātavyastigmaraśmeś ca yānaḥ/
ākrandārkāt saptame yaḥ sthitaś ca tattulyāste śaktitaś cintayīyāḥ//
siddhārtho 'rigaṇān vijitya na cirāt praṣṭā sametyālayam/
lagne vā kujamandayoḥ sutagate jīve ravau karmage
lābhe karmaṇi vā sitendusutayoḥ praṣṭur jayo niścitaḥ//
tasminn eva bhaved yoge yadi śukro 'ṣṭam āśritaḥ/
praṣṭāram udyamād eva hataśaktir viśasty ariḥ//
caturthe jñe 'ṣṭame candre jāyāsthe ca site jayaḥ//
candre ṣaṣṭhe vilagnasthaiḥ śeṣaiḥ praṣṭurdhruvo jayaḥ//
gurau vā lagnage pāpair lābhe karmaṇi vā sthitaiḥ//
ity yogāḥ śubhāḥ proktāḥ praśnakāle jayāśritāḥ/
aśubhās tu bhavanty atra tān pravakṣyāmy ataḥ param//
savakre nidhane mande mṛtyur lagne divākare/
candre 'smin tryāyamṛtyusthe sasūrye vā vaded vadham//
tadvan mandārayor yuddhe bhaṅgaḥ saumyārkayos tathā//
sarvais tu navame rājā hanti mantripurohitān/
candre 'ste vibalaiḥ saumyaiḥ praṣṭuḥ senāpater vadhaḥ//
jñe tṛtīye ca vikramya samantrī hanyate nṛpaḥ//
nandā bhadrā vijayāś cātha riktāḥ pūrṇāś caitāḥ phalam evaṃ vidadhyuḥ/
neṣṭā madhyā pravarāś ceti śukle kṛṇṇe cintyās tithayas tāḥ pratīpāḥ//
sarvāḥ śastās tithayaḥ śuklapakṣe hitvā tryṃśaṃ bahule 'ntyaṃ ca kaiścit/
ṣaṣṭhyaṣṭamyor vasulabdhāpi yātā dvādaśyāṃ vā nāśam āśu prayāti//
pratipadi phalam eke pañcadaśyāṃ ca neṣṭaṃ jagur idam iti tajjñair yāpyam evāvadhāryam/
kim api kim api nūnaṃ taiḥ samīkṣyoktam etat samavacanavighāte yuktatā kena cintyā//E3
surapatir api kṛcchraṃ yāti taṃ laṃghayitvā
prāgdvārikair analadiṅ na virodham eti śeṣāḥ pradakṣiṇagatāḥ vidiśaḥ prakalpyāḥ/
ullaṃghya daṇḍam api kāmam iyān narendraḥ śūlaṃ vihāya yadi diṅmukhalagnaśuddhiḥ//
yāmyām ājapade muraś calitavān yāto murārer vaśam/
rohiṇyāṃ namuciḥ pratīcy abhigataḥ pūrtiṃ gato vajriṇā
saumyām aryamadaivate ca gatavān mṛtyor vaśaṃ śambaraḥ//
puṣyo 'tha hastaḥ śravaṇaḥ śraviṣṭhā prācyādimukhyāny udag aśviyuk ca/
naiśākaraṃ tvāṣṭram athānurādhā pauṣṇaṃ ca madhyāni tathāhur eke//
sve sve karmaṇi pūjitāni munibhiḥ śuddhāni sarvāṇy api
rohiṇyāṃ triṣu cottareṣu vijayo yātur viśākhāsu ca
rātryādau tu na pauṣṇamaitraśaśibhatvāṣṭreṣu vāṃchan dyutiṃ
rātrer madhyam apāsya pūrvabharaṇīpitryeṣu hantuṃ parāḥ//
niśāntabhāge triṣu vaiṣṇavādyeṣv iyād dhanārthī na punarvasau ca/
kṛtvā prayāṇaṃ śravaṇe śriyo 'rthī viśen na jātuḥ kṣitipaḥ svasīmni//
saumye gatvādhyuṣya raudre 'ditīśe saṃprasthātā bādhate śatrusaṃghān/
maitre gatvā pauruhūte samuṣya? mūle yāyāc chatrunāśāya bhūpaḥ//
haste gatvā svāticitre samuṣya śakrāgnyṛkṣe prasthito bādhate 'rīn/
tiṣye pauṣṇe vāsave caikarātraṃ sīmni sthitvā bhūtim āpnoti yātā//
ṛkṣe pāpaiḥ saṃyute 'ntaḥ prakopo lakṣmībhraṃśo rāhuṇārkeṇa rogaḥ/
ketūlkābhyāṃ pīḍite deśanāśaḥ kleśaḥ saure soṣṇaraśmyātmaje ca//
bhinne graheṇa vaśatām upayāti śatroḥ sandhyārātre 'śanihate 'javighāta uktaḥ//
janmādi karma tato dṛśan na(va)maṃ saṃghātikaṃ coḍubhāgam/
ādyāt tu paṃcaviṃśaṃ mānasametaṃ naraḥ ṣaḍṛkṣaḥ syāt/
toyaiḥ snātvā nṛpatir yāyād yāmyāṃ diśaṃ haste//
akṣatamāṣāḥ khinnās tilasahitās taṇḍulā dadhi ca gavyam/
prāśyāḥ priyaṅgucitrāṇḍajāḥ phalaṃ yāvakaṃ kulatthāś ca/
madhusarpiṣī ca hastān mūlāny ambūni saktavo mūlāt//
śravaṇādīnām adyāc chāliṃ śākaṃ biḍālamāṃsaṃ ca/
prāśyādi ghṛtaṃ tilaudanaṃ matsyāḥ kṣīram iti pradakṣiṇam/
adyān nṛpatir yathādiśaṃ nakṣatrābhihitaṃ ca siddhaye//
asvādu cyutakacamakṣikānuviddhaṃ durgandhi kṣayakṛd abhūri yac ca dagdham/
susvinnaṃ mudu ruciraṃ manonukūlaṃ svādvannaṃ bahu vijayāya yānakāle//
guṇavati tithāv ṛkṣe 'niṣṭe divā gamanaṃ hitaṃ
niśi ca bhagane śastaṃ yānaṃ tithau guṇavarjite/
guṇam api tayoḥ samyag yātur jagāda bhṛgur muniḥ//E30
anilakaphajarogān śaktimānānnahāniṃ salilajanitapīḍāṃ cāhni yātā himāṃśoḥ//
ahani savitṛsūnor dainyam āpnoti gacchan svajanadhanaviyogaṃ mṛtyubandhāmayāṃś ca//
budhadivasagato 'rīn bādhate mantraśaktyā sravaṇasukhakathāptiṃ śilpimitrāgamāṃś ca/
kṣitidhanajayaratnastrīpratāpapramodān atibalam acireṇa svīkaroty ahni sūreḥ//
anupacayagato 'haḥ śastam apy apraśastaṃ śubham upacayasaṃsthaḥ pāpasaṃjño vidhatte//E4
garam api kaiś cic chastaṃ vaṇijaṃ ca vaṇikkriyāsv eva/
ahnaḥ pañcadaśāṃśo rātreś caivaṃ muhūrta iti saṃjñā//
sa ca vijñeyas tajjñaiś chāyāyantrāmbubhir yuktyā//
nakṣatravat kṣaṇānaṃ parighādi tadīśvaraiḥ samaṃ cintyaṃ/
phalam api tad eva dṛṣṭaṃ gargādyais tatra ca ślokāḥ//
aṣṭame 'rdhadivase same śubho yo viriñcavibhusaṃjñitaḥ kṣaṇaḥ/
tena yānam apahāya dakṣiṇāṃ sarvadikṣv abhijitā praśasyate//E7
satya āha gatikarmakalpahā janmagas tu himaguryiyāsataḥ/
tatra dehanavate 'vajāyate tena karmasu na sādhakaḥ smṛtaḥ//
tac ca tasya bahubhir viśodhitaṃ lagnam eva sutarāṃ yatas tanuḥ/
tulyadehanavatāṃ prapadya kiṃ sodayodayam uvāca śobhanam//
janmago 'pi hi tadā praśasyate yo 'ṣṭavargaśubhadaḥ sa śobhanaḥ//
yasya gocaraphalapramāṇatā tasya vedhaphalam iṣyate na vā/
prāyaśo na bahusaṃmataṃ tv idaṃ sthūlamārgaphalado hi gocaraḥ//
yasyotsṛjaty uḍupatiḥ puruṣo 'pasavyaṃ janmarkṣam āpadam upaiti sa bhūmipālaḥ/
yāyī tathetaragṛhopagate sitādau yāyītareś varajayo bahule kṣayaś ca//
horārāśāv upacayagṛhe janmabhe vā yiyāsor hānir hānāv uḍugaṇapatau vṛddhir āpūryamāṇe/
pakṣasy ādāv apacayagṛhe hānir āpūryamāṇe vṛddhis tūktā hrasati himagau kṛṣṇapakṣādisaṃsthe//
upacayagṛhayuktaḥ savyagaḥ śuklapakṣe śubham abhilaṣamāṇaḥ saumyamadhyasthito vā/
sakhivaśigṛhayuktaḥ kārakarkṣe 'pi cendur jayasukhaphaladātā tatprahartāny athātaḥ//
prakṣīṇe 'pya anupacayasthite 'pe yāyād viśrabdhaṃ yadi sakhivaśyakārakarkṣe/
naivaṃ ced udayagṛhāt svajanmabhād vā sampūrṇe 'py upacayage 'pi na prayāyāt//
bhṛgusutabudhabhinne ruk sureḍyena mṛtyur bhayam asitakujābhyāṃ ketunā strīpraṇāśaḥ/
apaṭukiraṇakāntau gacchataḥ śatruvṛddhiḥ savikṛtapariveṣe netranāśaḥ śaśāṅke//E10
dvipadavaśagāḥ sarve siṃhaṃ vihāya catuṣpadāḥ salilanilayābharkṣāvaśyāḥ sarīsṛpajātayaḥ/
mṛgapativaśe tiṣṭhanty ete vihāya sarīsṛpān na kathitagṛheṣūhyaṃ vaśyaṃ janavyavahārataḥ//
sthalajalajasarīsṛpāḥ svakānāṃ balam abhivīkṣya vidheyatāṃ bhajante/
viṣamagṛhavaśe samā dyusaṃsthā niśi viṣamā vaśavartinaḥ samānām//
śīrṣodaye samabhivāṃchitakāryasiddhiḥ pṛṣṭhodaye viphalatāṃ balavidravaś ca/
yātavyadiṅmukhagatasya sukhena siddhir vyarthaśramo bhavati dikpratilomalagen//
śastaṃ divā dinabale niśi naktavīrye rāśau viparyayabale gamanaṃ na śastam/
mīnodaye pravasataḥ kuṭilaḥ sadoṣo mārge bhavaty akṛtakāryanivartanam ca/
anyāṃśakeṣv api jhaṣe phalam etad eva mīnāṃśakeṣu ca pararkṣasamāśriteṣu//
ripunidhane ripunidhanaṃ ripuṣaṣṭhe lagnage vadho yātuḥ/
śatroḥ prasūtisamaye yadi nidhanaṃ saṃyutaṃ grahaiḥ pāpaiḥ/
saumyayutaṃ vā ṣaṣṭhaṃ sadasatphalatā tatas tābhyām//
kleśād vinā phalam arikṣayam arthasiddhiṃ prāpnoti lagnasahite pravasan svalagne/
arthakṣayaṃ śramamanarthamato dvitīye kalyāṇasaukhyavibhavāgamam āhur eke//
dyūne 'dhvavāhanavipatkṣudatiśramārtir bandho vadhaḥ paribhavo nidhane rujaś ca/
dharme 'rthanāśagadakāryavipadbhayāni kāryaṃ vinā balabhayaṃ daśame kṣayaś ca//
kecid vadanty upacayopagṛhītam etat tasmāc chubhaṃ daśamabhe gamanaṃ vilagen/
arthāptidīptiśubhasiddhijayāś ca lābhe ripphe chalaṃ vyaaybhaye vijite 'pi bhedaḥ//
dyūne kleśam avāpya janmabhavanāt prāpnoti paścāt sukham/
śeṣarkṣeṣu yathaiva lagnabhavanāt tadvat phalaṃ janmataḥ//
śastā cāndre devatārthaṃ svadeśe kauje pittavyālaśastrāgnipīḍā//
baudhe tuṣṭir vāṃchitāptir yaśaś ca jaive 'thāptiḥ sthānamānārināśāḥ/
strīratnāptiḥ kāryasiddhiś ca śaukre mānde bandhavyādhinīcāvamānāḥ//
saumyo 'pi janmani na yaḥ śubhapuṣṭidātā sthānaṃ na tasya śubhadaṃ vrajato vilagen/
pāpo 'pi yaḥ śubhaphalaṃ prakaroti puṃsāṃ sthānaṃ vilagnagatam iṣṭam uśanti tasya//
kecid vadanti yasmin graho niraṃśaṃ karoti tallagnam/
vṛṣavṛścikakarkaṭair nṛṇām anukūlair api lagnam āśritaiḥ/
veśirvilagnopagato yiyāsor vināpi yatnāt kurute phalāptim/
gauyānam iṣṭaṃ jalarāśilagne tad aṃśake cānyagṛhodaye 'pi//E20
ūrdhvā tiryag vānatā syāc ca horā muktā krāntā nāgatārkā krameṇa/
ity etāḥ syur jīvaśarmopadeśe jñeyo rāśir brahmaṣaṇḍasya pakṣe//
ūrdhvā syād yā ṣaṭcarādyeṣu horā bhūyo bhūyo maṇḍale kaiścid uktā/
rāśau rāśau prāgvilagnopayātaiḥ drekkāṇais tu prāha horāṃ vasiṣṭhaḥ//
sarvaṃ pramāṇaṃ municoditatvāt kiṃ tv atra yojyaṃ dalam eva horā/
yasmin sahasrāṃśuravasthito 'rdhe tiryaṅmukhī sā gaṇaye tato 'nyāḥ//
dhatte vāṃchitakāryam ūrdhvavadanā kleśād vinā lagnagā
sainyabhraṃśam adhomukhī prakurute kṛcchrād gṛhe cāgamaṃ
srvāḥ puṣṭaphalapradāḥ svapatinā dṛṣṭā na pāpagrahaiḥ//
grahadivasaphalaṃ yad eva yātur tad akhilam eva karoti tasya horā/
saumyair dṛṣṭe jayaḥ syāt praharaṇasahite pāpadṛṣṭe ca bhaṅgaḥ
sāgnau dāho 'tha bandhaḥ sabhujaganigale pāśayukte ca yātuḥ//
nṛpabhūrtir lagnagate drekkāṇe mantriṇo dvitīye ca/
jñeyaṃ balaṃ prayātur mantrasya viniścayaś ca tatparatah/
sainyārogyaṃ sainyaṃ catuṣpadaṃ ca kramāt tritaye//
kāryaṃ kośaḥ phalasiddhayas traye bhūmipās traye parataḥ/
ity udayādyā bhāvā drekkāṇair ye mayā samuddiṣṭāḥ/
yad udayati phalaṃ grahe pradiṣṭaṃ janayati tasya navāṃśako vlagne/
subhabhavananavāṃśe sahāyo ripubalabhāgam upaiti yātur atra//
yat proktaṃ rāśy udaye dvādaśabhāge 'pi tat phalaṃ vācyam/
yac ca navāṃśakavihitaṃ triṃśāṃśasyodaye tat syāt//E18
putrāpadaṃ sutagṛhe 'dhvani cārthasiddhiṃ ṣaṣṭhe 'bhivāṃchitaphalāptim arikṣayaṃ ca/
dyūne kalatrakalahaṃ dhanasaṃkṣayaṃ ca mṛtyuṃ karoti nidhane savitā rujaṃ ca//
dharmaṃ hinasti navame savitārthadaś ca hatvā viyatyaviditaṃ śramakarmadātā/
ratnāgamaṃ subahu lābhagataḥ karoti kṛtvā vyayaṃ vyayagataḥ kurute 'rtham alpam//
lagne śaśī kalahaśokakaro na pūrṇaḥ strīvājiratnasuhṛdātmajadaḥ kuṭumbe/
duścikyago yuvatiratnadhanapradātā bandhvāptidaḥ suhṛdi tatkṣayadaś ca kṛṣṇe//
arthapradas tanayagaḥ sutaśokakṛc ca mitrāritāṃ prakurute na sukhaṃ ca ṣaṣṭhe/
pratyeti cāśu navame kurute ca kāryaṃ kṣīṇe kṣayo viyati vṛddhirato 'nyathāsthe/
aiśvaryasaukhyadhanalābham upaite lābhe kleśakṣayavyayabhayāni ca riṣphayāte//
lagne viṣāgnirudhirāgamaśastrabādhā bhindyād balaṃ dhanagato 'rthakaraś ca paścāt/
putāpadaṃ kṣitisutaḥ kurute sutasthaḥ śatrupraṇāśam acirād arigaḥ karoti/
dharmaṃ na sādhayati dharmagato mahījaḥ śasto 'mbare na śubhadaḥ kathito 'pariś ca/
lābhe 'rthasiddhivibhavāgamadaḥ prayātur vittakṣayaṃ bahu karoti gataś ca riṣphe//
sotkaṇṭhaṃ sa virāgameti sahaje kāmān labhetākhilān/
ṣaṣṭhe yāty aribādhyatāṃ śaśisute kleśaś ca yātur bhavet//
kecit kleśam uśanti naidhanagate śaṃsanti kecic chubham/
dharme dharmavivṛddhir ambaragate siddhir bhaved īpsitā
vidyārthāptir ayatnataś ca parato riṣphe ca vācyo vyayaḥ//
kīrtir lagne 'rthāthasiddhir dvitīye duścikyasthe kṣucchramārtiḥ surejye/
pātālasthe dharmatatvābhimānā kāryaṃ sidhyaty ātmajasthe 'py asādhyam//
ṣaṣṭhe jīve śatrurāyāti vaśyaṃ kecit prāhur vaśyatāṃ yāti śatroḥ/
vindanty aste 'riṣṭayoṣāyaśāṃsi mṛtyau prāṇān hanty athānye jagur na//
putrotpattir dharmasiddhiś ca dharme jīve karmaṇy arthasiddhir yaśaś ca/
lābhe kāryaṃ vāñchitaṃ yāti siddhiḥ riṣphe prāpte kliśyate 'nekaduḥkhaiḥ//
lābho 'rthe sahaje na sīdati gataḥ prāpnoti śreṣṭhāṃ śrutim/
vyarthaṃ dvādaśago vyayaṃ prakurute śasto 'parair dvādaśe//
bandhaṃ vadhaṃ cārkasute vilagne dhane arthahāniṃ labhate śubhaṃ ca/
śatror balaṃ hanti gatas tṛtīye caturthago bandhubhayaṃ parebhyaḥ//
nārthasya siddhiḥ sutage 'rkaputre ripūn ripusthe sṛjayaty ayatnāt/
dharme na dharmaṃ labhate sukhañ ca yānāvṛtiṃ karmaphalaṃ ca svasthe/
ekādaśasthe jayavittalābhān mande 'ntyage nārtham upaiti yātā//
ekīyapakṣe 'pi hi kaiścid ukto bhṛguḥ śubho 'ntyātmajalābhavarjam/
saumyāsaumyeṣv etal lagnādstheṣu yat phalaṃ proktam/
horāvido jagur idaṃ sutāv abalo daśādhipāriś ca/
sāmprataṃ śubhadaḥ sutau balanvito yo daśādhi(pa)mitraṃ ca/
pāpāṃ copacayasthaṃ na vilagne tatra ca ślokau//
tac ca viruddhaṃ teṣāṃ katham anyadaśāsu dāsyate svaphalam/
evaṃ phalasya nāśo vrajati sarvasya phalali(lī)psoḥ//
tasmān naikānto 'yaṃ jātakam avalokya nirdiśet sadasat/
ślokau vṛttaṃ bhedaṃ prāha maṇittho vasiṣṭhaś ca//
rakṣakā vardhakāś caiva ye syur janmani nāyakāḥ/
tān pāpān api niḥśaṅko yātrālagneṣu yojayet//
tān sarvān avalokyaiva prayāṇeṣv api yojayet//
horāgataḥ svabhavane yadi sūryaputro meṣopago 'vanisutaḥ svagṛhe śaśāṅkaḥ/
śukras tulādharagato mithune budhaś ca siṃhe ravir yadi ca pārthivajanma vidyāt//
te sarve nānākhyā krūrāḥ saumyaiḥ samāścintyāḥ//
yo yasya daśamagṛhagaḥ sa tasya vaśyas tu bhavati niyamena/
yaś cātha paṇapharasthaḥ sa bhavati rakṣopagas tadvat//
janmeśvaralagnapayor yaḥ śatrur lagnagaḥ sa saumyo 'pi/
kurute dehavipattiṃ krūro 'pi śubhaṃ tayor mitram//
bhaven na yaḥ kārakatānasaṃjñaḥ svajanmalagnādhipayoḥ śubho 'pi/
karoti lagnopagataḥ sa yātur bhayaṃ vināśaṃ ca bahuprakāram//
tasmāt praytnād idm eva cintyaṃ yiyāsatāṃ kārakatānayātam//
eko 'pi vakropagato narāṇāṃ śubho 'śubho vāpi catuṣṭayasthaḥ/
yo 'staṃ yāty udayaṃ vā dakṣiṇamārgasthitaḥ sahastrāṃśoḥ/
tigmakarasyottarato darśanam āyāti yo graho 'staṃ vā/
madhye tu vā sa lagne yātuḥ kusumāmbarāśanadaḥ//
vikṛtistho galnagato na śubhaḥ śubhadaḥ svabhavanasthaḥ//
yāmye tamo jñaḥ śravaṇe ravis tu jāto viśākhāsu sitaś ca puṣye/
svayam arir upaiti vaśyaṃ praṇataśirāḥ sārvabhaumo 'pi//
pakeśvarārilagne varge vā tasya bhūpatir gacchan/
yātrāphalaṃ caturthe jāmitre śatravaḥ pramādaś ca/
satyācāryasya mate vibalaḥ śastaḥ śaśī prayāṇeṣu/
digvīryonaḥ kevalam induḥ śasta iti jagur anye//
yad eva yasyodayasaṃsthitasya phalaṃ prayāṇe sadasat pradiṣṭam/
tad eva tasyākhilam ahni yātur grahasya varge ca vilagnasaṃsthe//E38
vyasanaṃ prāpno(ti) mahad vyatipāte nirgato 'thavā mṛtyum/
na sadṛśadaśo 'bhiyojyaḥ sandhānaṃ tena bhūpater vyāsam/
upacayakartur vrajed diśaṃ balavati kaṇṭakage ca dikpatau/
manasāpi na digbalānvite digadhipatau ca lalāṭasaṃsthite//
krūrāv api nityam eva tau saumyair eva samāv udāhṛtau//
parasparaṃ saurikujau ravīndū trikoṇagau bhārgavalohitau ca/
phalaṃ yad uktaṃ tad aśeṣam eva vināśya paścāt svadiśaṃ nayantām//
ripudivaso yasya bhavet saumyo 'pi sa lagnago na śubhadātā/
bhānau kulīrajhaṣavṛścikage 'tidīrghā śastas tu devalamate 'dhvani pṛṣṭhato 'rkaḥ//
śukre pravasan narer vaśaṃ yāti budhe ca vilomasaṃsthite//
anulo(ma)gate śaśāṅkaje śukre caivam api vyavasthite/
ākrandasārī dinamadhyago 'rkaḥ pauraḥ purastād aparatra yāyī/
ākranda indur gurumandasaumyāḥ paurāḥ smṛtā yāyina ity ato 'nye//
satyaṃ tathā kiṃ tu viśeṣam āhus te bhūpateḥ satphaladā jigīṣoḥ//
dṛṣṭe sāmnāṃ karmaniṣṭaṃ surārau vaitālīyaṃ pādadambhau ca hitvā/
śasto rāhus tryāyakarmopayāto yātavyaś cāsannatāgaś ca ketuḥ//
sāmnāṃ śukrabṛhaspatī dinakaro vakraś ca daṇḍeśvarau
athāyanena yugapad ekasaṃsthayor dyunaktayo raviśaśinor vrajet tadā//E25
yoṣitsaukhyaṃ gaṇḍe dṛkcaramādhaś ca saṅgare vijayaḥ/
śravaṇe ca hitaśravaṇaṃ nāsāyāṃ prītisaukhyaṃ ca//
haste 'rthāptiḥ pṛṣṭhe parājayo vakṣasi smṛto vijayaḥ/
prītyutpattiḥ pārśve stane tv apūrvā viṣayalabdhiḥ//
pṛṣṭhata ūrvor doṣaḥ purataś calane tu śacivahitalabdhiḥ/
pracalati ca jānusandhāv arisandhānaṃ balavad uktam//
ripunidhanapraṇidhānaṃ prati bhavataḥ kiṃ manaḥ kurute//
brūyāt sa cen mama manaḥ protsahate harṣayet tataś caivam/
ekataś ca manaśśuddhis tad dhi śuddhaṃ jayāvaham//
kiyac ciraṃ na labhyeta nimittaṃ gamanānugam/
na tv eva tu mano 'narthaṃ cireṇāpy anumanyate//
tejo hy etac charīrasthaṃ trikālaphaladaṃ nṛṇām//
tasmāt sarvātmanā yātur anumeyaṃ sadā manaḥ//E6
tryaham atha vijayasnānaṃ gṛhayajñaṃ saptame divase//
ardhaniśāyām udayati saumye vakre 'thavā tadaṃśe vā/
dadyād baliṃ daśasv apy āśāsu purohitaḥ kramaśaḥ//
evam uktvā tatas tv arghyaṃ pramathebhyaḥ pradāpayet/
ye syur bhūtagaṇās tebhyo namo 'stv ity anuyāntu ca/
nivṛttayātraḥ punar apy ahaṃ hi vo vijitya śatrūn bhavatāṃ prasādataḥ/
ato viśiṣṭaṃ bahuvittam uttamaṃ baliṃ kariṣye vidhinopapāditam//
anarcitā ye nṛpatiṃ savāhanaṃ vināśayanti kṣapayanti vā camūn/
supūjitāḥ siddhikarā bhavanti te pravādhakāḥ śatrugaṇasya cāhave//
abhyarcya mantrais tu purohitas tān adhaś ca tasyāṃ bhuvi saṃskṛtāyām/
darbhais tu kṛtvāstaram akṣatais ca kiret samantāt sitasarṣapaiś ca//
brāhmīṃ sadūrvām atha nāgapuṣpīṃ kṛtvopadhānaṃ śirasi kṣitīśaḥ/
pūrṇān ghaṭān puṣpaphalābhidhānān āśāsu kuryāc caturaḥ krameṇa//
yaj jāgrato dūram upaiti daivam āvartya mantrāṃ kramaśas trir etam/
laghv ekabhug dakṣiṇapārśvaśāyī svapnaṃ parīkṣeta yathopadeśam//
niśānte paśyati svapnaṃ śubhaṃ vā yadi vā 'śubham//
gataiṣyajātyantarasattvasaṅgaiḥ svapne 'py anūke gatije ca nityam/
daśāsu coktaṃ grahapākajātaṃ cintā tu dṛṣā tu yathā tathaiva/
dyudṛṣṭapūrvāḥ kathitāś ca tadvad anyatra loke kathitā viśeṣāḥ//
bandho vā nigale grasec ca dahanaṃ nānāśirobāhutā
chatraṃ vā dvirado 'bhiṣicya bibhṛyād divyo 'thavā brāhmaṇaḥ//
viśati yadi vā suśliṣṭāṅgī tanuṃ pravarāṅganā//
daraṇam api ca mūrdhnaḥ sapta pañca tridhā vā/
abhaya jaya ca bhuṃkṣva ceti śabdāḥ pariṇatarājyaphalapradāḥ pradiṣṭāḥ//
(tada)nūkam iti proktam iha paścāt karoti yat//
kāminyāṃ dhanalabdhir ambutaraṇe śokasya nāśo bhaved
dharṣo roditaśocitādiṣu tathā dāhe vivṛddhir matā/
svapne tan niyamād bhavaty avitathaṃ neṣṭaṃ śubhaṃ vā phalam//
svadravyanāśaḥ suhṛdāṃ viyogaśchedaś ca pāṇyoḥ kamalāpahāraḥ/
mitrasyāptiḥ syādvikośāsilābhe vaśyaṃ gacched bhūpateḥ śāsanāptau/
sarpe karṇau nāsikāṃ vā praviṣṭe tacchedaḥ syād veṣṭane cāśu bandhaḥ//
ādye varṣād vatsarārdhād dvitīye yāme pāko varṣapādāt tṛtīye/
māsāt pākaḥ śarvarīpaścimāṃśe sadyaḥ pāko govisarge ca dṛṣṭe//
dṛṣṭvā svapnaṃ śobhanaṃ neha supyāt paścād dṛṣṭo yaḥ sa pākaṃ vidhatte/
śaṃsediṣṭaṃ tatra sādhudvijebhyas te tvāśibhiḥ pūjayeyur narendram//
bhūyaḥ prasvapanaṃ na cāsya kathanaṃ gaṅgābhiṣeko japaḥ
tanmadhye brāhmī brahmā sāma dūrvāgraśaṃkhapuṣpāḥ syuḥ/
tasya grahānulomaṃ kālaṃ kecij jagur niṣeveta/
śvetasya babhror athavā vṛṣasya carmāstare vyāghramṛgendrayor vā/
tatsthasya kuryān manujeśvarasya jayābhiṣekaṃ vidhivat purodhāḥ//
kramān mahīrūpyasuvarṇakumbhaiḥ kṣīrasya dadhno haviṣaś ca pūrṇaiḥ/
snāyāc ca toyaiḥ saha saptamṛdbhiḥ paścāc ca sarvauṣadhigandhatoyaiḥ//
dvātriṃśatiṃ ṣoḍaśa vāthavāṣṭau ghaṭapramāṇaṃ munibhiḥ pradiṣṭam/
snātas tv alaṅkāram apāsya pūrvaṃ navaṃ vidadhyād dvijamantrapūrtam//
vāme 'sya pārśve 'grata āsthito vā pratīpapātaṃ juhuyād dhutāśam//
āsevya sarvāṇi yathopadeśaṃ bhaktyā dvijān svasti ca vācayitvā//
saumyena yāyāt phalapuṣpapāṇir dvāreṇa paśyen na ca pauruhūtam/
prāg uddhared dakṣiṇapādam evaṃ kurvan nṛpaḥ sarvaripūn praśāsti//E16
grahayajñam ato vakṣye tatra nimittāni lakṣayed vedyām/[cited in bs 43.14]
ā kṛṣṇeti ca mantro raktā gandhāḥ sahāguraṇāḥ//
nyagrodhāt sruksamidhaḥ sphaṭikād arcā ca śitagoḥ kāryā/
rajataśaphaviṣāṇāṃ kṣīriṇīṃ ca tu himāṃśum uddiśya//(candraḥ)
raktakaravīrasamidho raktā gandhāś ca candanāt pratimā/
sruksamidhaś ca madhūkād atha vā cāndrer apāmārgāt//
annāt parisrutādyo mantraḥ strīkarkaśās tv alaṅkārāḥ/
mantraś ca kayā naścitrapūrvako 'rcā ca nāgamayī//
viprebhya iti yad anyat tat sarvaṃ sūryaputrasamam//(rāhuḥ)
ketoḥ kāṃsyapratimā ketuṃ kṛṇvann na ketave mantraḥ/
kṛtvaivaṃ grahapūjām ṛcā tataś cāgniliṅgayā juhuyāt/
tato 'pratirathaṃ kṛtsnaṃ yātrāliṅgaṃ ca yad bhavet/
bhūta bhūteti ca gaṇaṃ yatte candras tathaiva ca/
aindro gaṇas tathā cāndro mantrāśīḥsūktam eva ca//
bhūyo bhūyas tathā jvālāṃ saṃspṛśyātha purohitaḥ/
spṛśec ca nṛpatiṃ mantrair uccair brūyāt punaḥ punaḥ//
cakṣurdaḥ prāṇadaś cāpi varcodaś ca bhava prabho/
śātravāṇāṃ tathā rājāpy anādhṛṣyo bhavaty ayam/
hūyamāne nimittāni vakṣyāmy aham ataḥ param//
dgārādyaṃ ca purodhasaḥ smṛtivipac cāniṣṭam anyac chubham/
tan neṣṭaṃ śubham anyathopakaraṇaṃ dravyāṇy anūnāni ca//
utthāya svayam ujjvalārcir analaḥ svāhāvasāne havir
bhukte dehasukhaḥ pradakṣiṇagatiḥ snigdho mahān saṃhataḥ/
savye 'ṅge nṛpatiṃ dahann atihitaḥ śeṣaṃ ca lokād vadet//E10
vrajed digīśaṃ hṛdaye niveśya yathendra mainryām aparāś ca tadvat/
dvātriṃśataṃ samupagamya padāni bhūmau prāgādi nāgarathavājinraiḥ prayāyāt//E3
vistīrṇakarṇahanunābhilalāṭaguhyāḥ kūrmonnatair\footnote{Bṣ 66.7b kūrmonnata-} dvinavaviṃśatibhir nakhaiś ca/
garbhiṇīṃ ca nṛpatiḥ paradeśaṃ prāpayed ativirūpaphalās te//
pārthivopakaraṇākṛtiṃ yadā cihnam udvahati kalpite rade/
dakṣiṇe śubham atīva śobhanaṃ pāpam apy ativirūpam anyataḥ/
skhalitagatir akasmāt trastakarṇo 'tidīnaḥ śvasiti mṛdu sudīrghaṃ nyastahastaḥ pṛthivyām/
drutamukulitadṛṣṭiḥ svapnaśīlo vilomo bhayakṛd ahitabhakṣī naikaśo 'sṛcchakṛtkṛt//
yāyād yātrānulomaṃ tvaritapadagatir vaktram unnāmya coccaiḥ/
kakṣāsannāhakāle janayati ca muhuḥ śīkaraṃ vṛṃhitaṃ vā
tatkālaṃ vā madāptir jayakṛd atha radaṃ veṣṭayan dakṣiṇaṃ ca//E15
prākphalatulyaṃ pṛṣṭhe jaghane vāleṣu caiva nirdiṣṭam/
vijayāya sarvaidaiva hi suśuklaśukavarṇayor jvalanam eṣu/
evaṃ ca yathāsambhavam anyeṣv api vāhaneṣu phalam//
sajṛmbhaṇaṃ pṛṣṭhavidhūnanaṃ ca vālaprakāras tv asakṛl lilikṣoḥ/
niśāsu cānyonyavirodhanaṣṭanidrās turaṅgā na śivāya bhartuḥ//
jaṃghe liṃhannavraṇaromapaṅke pādau ca saṃhṛṣṭatanur jayāya/
viparyayaḥ paścimayoḥ prayatnāt svayaṃ tu yātrābhimukho niyamya//
muhurmuhur mūtraśakṛt karoti na tāḍyāmāno 'py anulomayāyī/
akāryabhīto 'śruvilocanaś ca śivaṃ na bhartus turago vidhatte//
ārohati kṣitipatau vinayopapanno yātrānugo 'nyaturagaṃ pratiheṣitaś ca/
vaktreṇa vā spṛśati dakṣiṇam ātmapārśvaṃ yo 'śvaḥ sa bhartur acirāt pratanoti lakṣmīm//E21
anyajanmāntarakṛtaṃ puṃsāṃ karma\footnote{Bṣ 85.5b karma puṃsāṃ} śubhāśubham/
yat tasya śukunaḥ pākaṃ nivedayati gacchatām//
pṛthagjāty anavasthānād eṣāṃ vyaktir na labhyate\footnote{Bṣ 85.7d lakṣyate}/
pathyātmānaṃ nṛpaṃ sainye pure coddiśya devatām/
sārthe prdhānaṃ sāmye tu\footnote{Bṣ 85.11d syāj} jātividyāvayodhikam//
tatpañcamadiśāṃ tulyaṃ phalaṃ\footnote{Bṣ 85.13b śubhaṃ} traikālyam ādiśet/
sthānavṛdhyupaghātāś ca tadvad brūyāt phalaṃ budhaḥ\footnote{Bṣ 85.14d punaḥ}//
svabhūmāv anulomāś ca tadūnāḥ syur vivarjitāḥ//
balinaḥ siṃhanādāś ca kūṭapūrī ca pūrvataḥ//
divācaro na śarvaryāṃ na ca naktaṃcaro divā//
āpagāntaritā mattā na grāhyāḥ śakunāḥ kvacit//
na tu bhrādrapade grāhyāḥ sūkarāś ca\footnote{Bṣ 85.27b sva} vṛkādaya/
hemante niṣphalā jñeyā bālāḥ sarve vimānuṣāḥ//
dhanavānīkṣaṇīkaś ca mālākāras tataḥ param\footnote{Bṣ 85.23d paraṃ tataḥ}//
vaiṣṇavaś carakaś caiva vājinām rakṣaṇe rataḥ/
rājā kumāro netā ca dūtaḥ śreṣṭhī caro dvijaḥ/
gacchatas tiṣṭhato vāpi diśi yasyāṃ vyavasthitaḥ/
satūryādhvayanāḥ puṃvat strīvad anyā giraḥ śubhāḥ//
grāmyau madhyamaṣaḍjau tu gāndhāraś ceti śobhanāḥ/
chitkaraḥ\footnote{Bṣ 85.44a chikkaraḥ} kūṭapūrī ca pirilī(?) cāhni dakṣiṇāḥ/
śreṣṭhe hayasite prācyāṃ śavamāṃse ca dakṣiṇe/
yānavyatyastagā grāhyā viśeṣaś cātra kathyate\footnote{Bṣ 85.47d vakṣyate}//
sarva eva viparyasthā grāhyāḥ sārtheṣu yoṣitām//
vāmadakṣiṇagau śastau yau tu tāv agrapṛṣṭhagau/
kecit tu śakunadvāram icchanty ubhayataḥ sthitaiḥ/
visarjayati yady eka ekaś ca pratiṣedhati/
sa virodho 'śubho yātur grāhyo vā balavattaraḥ//
pūrvaṃ prāveśiko bhūtvā punaḥ prāsthāniko bhavet/
visṛjya śakunaḥ pūrvaṃ sa eva niruṇaddhi cet/
prāha yātur arer mṛtyuṃ samaraṃ\footnote{Bṣ 85.56d ḍamaraṃ} rogam eva ca//
ārambhe śakuno dīpto vṛṣānte\footnote{Bṣ 85.57d varṣāntas} tadbhayaṃkaraḥ//
kurvanti śakunā dīptāḥ śāntā yāpyaphalās tu te//
sthānāt krośan\footnote{Bṣ 85.62c ruvan} vrajed yātrāṃ śaṃsate tv anyathāgamam//
uccam ādau dhvaniṃ\footnote{Bṣ 85.63c svaraṃ} kṛtvā nīcaṃ paścāc ca doṣakṛt//
ekasthāne ruvan dīptaḥ saptāhād grāmanāśakṛt\footnote{Bṣ grāmaghātakaḥ}/
iṣṭaṃ vā gorasānnaṃ vā bhāradvājasya darśane/
anulomo vṛṣo nardan dhanyo gaur mahiṣas tathā/
ulūkī vāmataḥ kṣemyā dakṣiṇena ca kokilā/
śarkariś ca (?) mayūraś ca śasyate dakṣiṇe sadā//
vṛkāḥ śṛgālāḥ śārdūlā viḍālā gardabhāḥ śunaḥ/
pūrvodīcyoḥ śivā śastā śāntā sarvatra pūjitā/
[rājā kumāro netā ca dūtaḥ śreṣṭhī caro dvijaḥ/
pure sainye 'pasavyā ca kaṣṭā pūrvonmukhā śivā//
yāhīty agnibhayaṃ śāsti ṭāṭeti mṛticoditā\footnote{Bṣ 89.6b mṛtavedikā}/
naiva dāruṇatām eke svajvālāyāḥ\footnote{Bṣ 89.7b sajvālāyāḥ} pracakṣate/
arkādyanalavat tasyā vaktrāj jvālā svabhāvataḥ\footnote{Bṣ 89.7d vaktraṃ lālāsvabhāvataḥ}//
vāruṇyābhirutā\footnote{Bṣ 89.8c anurutā} saiva saṃsate salile mṛtim//
kṣobhāt pradhānabhedaś ca vāhanānām asampadaḥ\footnote{Bṣ 89.9d ca sampadaḥ}/
phalam ā saptamād etad agrāhyaṃ parato rute/
yāmyāyāṃ tadviparyastaṃ phalaṃ ṣaṭpañcamād rute\footnote{Bṣ 89.10d ṛte}//
yā romāṃcaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ śakṛnmūtraṃ ca vājinām/
rāvāt trāsaṃ ca janayet sā śivā na śivapradā//
yā śivā sā śivaṃ sainye pure vā saṃprayacchati//E11
śasto nīḍas tu vaiśākhe padape nirupadrave/
hared upanayed vāpi yad dravyaṃ vāyaso 'grataḥ/
raktadravyaṃ pradagdhaṃ vā nyasan gehe 'gnidaḥ smṛtaḥ/
vargataś cābhighātaḥ syād ripuvṛddhiś ca nirbhayaiḥ//
mṛtyuṃ tatsvāmino brūyāt pūjā syāt tatprapūjane//
viruvan cāgrataḥ pakṣe dhūnvan dhvāṃkṣo bhayapradaḥ/
pratyurasy upasarpan ca saṃsparśan ca tathā bhavet//
vāyasaḥ śasyate yātus tūṣṇībhūto ruvann api//
sabhayo vicaran vinā nimittaṃ na śubhaś cābhimukho bhaṣan likhan gām//
uccair bhaṣaṇaṃ samāgatānāṃ dīnaṃ vābhirutaṃ raviṃ nirīkṣya/
saṃgharadanajṛmbhaṇe ca neṣṭe prasthāneṣu tathā vidhūnanaṃ ca//
pūrṇāsyatvaṃ ghrāyakatvaṃ ca yātuḥ prādakṣiṇyaṃ maithunaṃ cānulomam/
yātrākāle sārameyasya śastaṃ padbhyāṃ mūrdhanaḥ svasya kaṇḍūyanaṃ ca//E3
svayam atha racitāny ayatnato vā yadi kathitāni bhavanti maṅgalāni/
sa jayati sakalāṃ tato dharitrīṃ grahaṇadṛgālabhanaśrutair upāsya//
uttiṣṭhato vāmbaram eti saṅgaṃ patec ca vā tannṛpateḥ kṣayāya/
prāyo bale netari vā nṛpe vā jānīta rājño bhayakāraṇaṃ tat//
neṣṭāni śabdāś ca tathaiva yātur āgacchatiṣṭhapraviśasthirādyāḥ//
kāryam tu mūlaśakune 'nyataraje tadahni vidyāt phalaṃ niyatam evam ime vicintyāḥ/
prārambhayānasamaye tu tathā praveśe grāhyaṃ kṣutam na śubhadaṃ kvacid apy uśanti//
krośād ūrdhvaṃ śakunavirutaṃ niṣphalaṃ prāhur eke
tatrāniṣṭe prathamaśukune mānayet paṃca ṣaḍ vā/
pratyāgacchet svabhavanam ato yady aniṣṭas tṛtīyaḥ//
cakre varāhamihiraḥ śakunopadeśam uddeśato munimatāny avalokya samyak/
yad granthavistarabhayād avijānato vā noktaṃ tad anyakathitād api cintanīyam//E6
snigdhā sthirā surabhigulmalatā sugandhā śastā pradakṣiṇajalā ca nivāsabhūmiḥ/
hatvā paśuṃ ripugṛhākṛtam udyame ca prāsyātha vānnamayam asya vidhāya rūpam//
tac cāyuktam iti prāhur horāśāstravido janāḥ/
visrambhahā krodhavaśo nṛśaṃsaḥ kṣudraḥ pramādī na bahuśrutaś ca/
divyāntarikṣakṣitijair vikārair nipīḍito yaḥ sa tu daivahīnaḥ//
tarur ghunair jagdha ivāttavīryo mahān api kṣipram upaiti bhaṅgam//E3
sotpātaprakṛtiviparyayānuyātā śokārtā ripuvaśam āśu yāti senā//
saṃgrāme vayam amaradvijaprasādāj jyoṣyāmo ripubalam āśv asaṃśayena/
yasyaivaṃ bhavati bale janapravādaḥ so 'lpo 'pi pracurabalaṃ ripuṃ nihanti//
jayadam ubhayapārśvādhiṣṭhitaṃ pṛṣṭhato vā na śubhakaram ato 'nyad yānakāle nṛbhartuḥ//
vajramucaḥ kṣatajāśmamuco vā balabhayam āśu janāḥ kathayanti//
bhṛśaṃ kṣaranto rudhirāruṇā vā saśakracāpā khararūkṣanādāḥ/
kṣc coṣṇāyāṃ bhavati na cirād ambudāyāṃ vināśaḥ//
cāpam aindram anulomam akhaṇḍaṃ projjvalaṃ bahulam āyatam iṣṭam/
tanvī pralambā vijayāya dīrghā taḍid ghanasphūrjathuvarjitā ca/
lagne 'rkendū nighnatī śasti paurān ulkā hanyād yātupaurān grahāś ca/
yātuḥ śastā sambhṛtā vā dhruvarkṣe neṣṭāto 'nyā dhūminī śyāvaraktā//
velā kramaśo dināditaḥ kāṣṭhāyāṃ ca sa yatra bhūsvanaś ca//
śastā śāntadvijamṛgaghuṣṭā sandhyā snigdhā mṛduṣavanā ca/
pāṃśudhvastā janapadanāśaṃ dhatte rūkṣā rudhiranibhā vā//E13
nīhāraḥ pāṃśupātaś ca hitaḥ snigdhaḥ pradakṣiṇaḥ//
baleśaṃ yuvarājaṃ ca purohitam iti kramāt//
pradakṣiṇaṃ tu yātrāyāṃ jayadaṃ neṣṭam anyathā//
śvabhronnate vadho rājño jayāya vyatyayena ca//
ghṛtāmbupayasāṃ srāve cyute vṛkṣāc ca tatkṣayaḥ/
taile ca nāśo mukhyānāṃ rakte śastrakṛtaṃ bhayam//
madyena tu mitho bhedo rugbhayaṃ dadhinisrave/
dinolkāyāṃ ca pīḍyante janā bhūpatibhiḥ saha//
saptāhaṃ santatāny ato vṛṣṭir hanyān narādhipam/
anagnijvalane puṃsāṃ vyādhir āśv eva jāyate//
gadane cāpi deśasya nāśaṃ māsatrayād vadet//
niśi suracāpaṃ sitavarṇādyaṃ janayati pīḍāṃ dvijapūrvāṇām/
bhavati ca yasyāṃ diśi taddiśyaṃ narapatimukhyaṃ na cirād dhanyāt//
vibudhapatidhvajatoraṇapātaḥ phalam idam eva karoti nṛpāṇām//E18
sarvārambhaphalaprasiddhir udaye rāśau ca kartuḥ śubhe
krūrodaye tadahani vyatipātayoge rikte tithāv ṛtusamāptiṣu vaidhṛte vā/
tīkṣṇograbheṣu ca hutāśaviṣābhighātaraudrāṇi siddhim upayāny asite ca pakṣe//
sūryendvoḥ pariveṣakhaṇḍam athavā dṛśyeta yasyāṃ diśi/
sainye vāpi yato viśanti hi tataḥ śastroḥ puraṃ ghātayet//
pātālarkṣe rāhuketvoḥ pure 'res toyocchittiḥ sālapātaś ca kāryaḥ/
jāmitrasthe bhūmije 'syāṃśake vā putreṇendor vīkṣite 'gniḥ pradeyaḥ//E5
yuddhānte mṛgaśakunaiś ca dīptanādair no bhadraṃ bhavati jaye 'pi pārthivasya//
yadānyad api vaikṛtaṃ na vijayāvasāne bhavet
tadā sukham akaṇṭakaṃ nṛpatir atti deśaṃ ripoḥ/
udvāham akālotsavam abhiṣekaṃ cātmajasya yaḥ kṛtvā/
iti manujapatir yathopadeśaṃ bhagaṇavidāṃ prakaroti yo vacāṃsi/
